name: Menari diperapian | Meta Visual Poetry series [1]
description:
This poem is the embodiment when a human soul is at its lowest point.  all thoughts enter causing confusion that makes us lose control.  Emptiness, depression, anxiety, are factors that lead to hopelessness for the life that is being lived.  all meaningless actions, all expectations poisoned with inferiority.  This poem is written in Indonesian.  To make it easier for you, I provide a translation in English.  maybe this English does not cover the whole meaning (because of the difference in meaning equivalent), but hopefully the essence of this poem is conveyed.

dancing in the fireplace

1. 
Hesitate to digest the lost life
There is no means for me
to make room for the possibility to say;  why? 
The opaque mist led me into the abyss of nothingness
The wound is transformed into the world
With his rejection of the problems of life in the void
The spirit of grieving that is increasingly felt
and the arrogance of problems such as age that refuses to grow old.
-
hell I feel so real
The soul is increasingly sinking into an incomplete framework called Anger
The waves did not find their calm
Anger is my friend against the world
Fight fire with fire and create the hell
Dismay and anger found his home
On the soul of the sorrowful who is feeling hell.

Arifansdr
2017.
